name: 10th Corpse
description: 10th Corpse is a Match 3 game with plenty of fun twists. Shadows of deception are lurking in Mansion Vinterfragen! A mystery story, a criminal to catch! Madame Vinterfragen has just discovered a sinister threat in her own mansion! You are the ace detective trusted by Madame Vinterfragen, the only one with the guts and intelligence to solve this mystery. Is this a reenactment of an ancient curse, or is it a cold-blooded killing plotted by one of Madame’s guests? Twisted Match 3 sessions are waiting for you in Mansion Vinterfragen!
